trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrame"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 表示一套<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrame"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: This collection is used as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixAnimationUsingKeyFrames> to animate a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix> property value along a set of key frames.
trans-unit.target: 此集合用作的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixAnimationUsingKeyFrames>要进行动画处理<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix>根据一组关键帧的属性值。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixAnimationUsingKeyFrames>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Implicit Collection Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *oneOrMoreMatrixKeyFrameObjectElements* One or more objects, declared using object element syntax.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 隐式集合用法``` ``` # # XAML 值*oneOrMoreMatrixKeyFrameObjectElements*一个或多个对象，使用对象元素语法声明。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrameCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrameCollection"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrame"></xref> to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 将添加<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrame"></xref>到集合的末尾。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrame"></xref> to add to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrame"> </xref>将添加到集合的末尾。

trans-unit.source: The index at which the keyFrame was added.
trans-unit.target: 开始的索引 keyFrame 已添加。

trans-unit.source: Removes all <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrame"></xref> objects from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 中删除所有<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrame"></xref>从集合的对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrameCollection"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrameCollection"> </xref>，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定 （但可能不再解析），但不是动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A> method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the collection contains the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrame"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示集合是否包含指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrame"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrameCollection.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法执行的线性搜索;因此，平均执行时间正比<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrameCollection.Count%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrameCollection.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: That is, this method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrameCollection.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，此方法为 O (*n*) 操作，其中*n*为<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrameCollection.Count%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrameCollection.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method determines equality by calling <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.target: 标识内容复制到其中的数组。

trans-unit.target: 集合的内容复制到数组中的索引位置。

trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的冻结实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrameCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A frozen instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrameCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 冻结的实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrameCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets an empty <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrameCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取空<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrameCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An empty <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrameCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An empty <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrameCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Makes this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrameCollection"></xref> unmodifiable or determines whether it can be made unmodifiable.
trans-unit.target: 使此实例的<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrameCollection"></xref>不可修改，或确定是否可使其成为不可修改。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this method should simply determine whether this instance can be frozen.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此方法只能确定此实例是否可以冻结。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if this instance should actually freeze itself when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>如果此实例时调用此方法实际上应冻结自身。

trans-unit.source: If isChecking is true, this method returns if this instance can be made read-only, or if it cannot be made read-only.
trans-unit.target: 如果 isChecking 为 true，此方法返回如果此实例可以成为只读的或如果它不能成为只读的。

trans-unit.source: If isChecking is false, this method returns if this instance is now read-only, or if it cannot be made read-only, with the side effect of having begun to change the frozen status of this object.
trans-unit.target: 如果 isChecking 为 false，此方法将返回如果此实例现在为只读的或如果无法成为只读的并且具有已开始更改此对象冻结的状态的副作用。

trans-unit.source: Makes this instance a clone of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrameCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 使此实例的指定克隆<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrameCollection"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定 （但可能不再解析），但不是动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: Note that if these properties contain resource references or data bindings, <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A> will fail when trying to freeze the object and will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果这些属性包含资源引用或数据绑定<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A>将失败时尝试冻结该对象，并将引发<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A> method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A>方法应不直接从代码中，除非调用时调用时重写此方法的基实现。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A>

trans-unit.target: 使此实例的指定的冻结的复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrameCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、 数据绑定和动画，而其当前值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrameCollection"></xref> to copy and freeze.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrameCollection"> </xref>要复制和冻结。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 返回可循环访问集合的枚举。

trans-unit.source: Enumerators only allow reading the data in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 枚举器只允许读取集合中的数据。

trans-unit.source: Enumerators cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 枚举器不能用于修改基础集合。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 最初，枚举数定位在集合中的第一项之前。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> also brings the enumerator back to this position.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>此外会回此位置的枚举数。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>

trans-unit.source: At this position, calling <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 在此位置，调用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>引发异常。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must call <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> to advance the enumerator to the first item of the collection before reading the value of <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，你必须调用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>到集合，然后再读取<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>的值的第一项枚举器向前移动</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> returns the same object until either <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>返回相同的对象之前<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>或<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>称为。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A></xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> sets <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> to the next item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>设置<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>至下一项。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A></xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the end of the collection is passed, the enumerator is positioned after the last item in the collection, and calling <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举数传递到集合的末尾之后，将放后的最后一项在集合中，且调用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>返回`false`。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the last call to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returned `false`, calling <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果最后一次调用到<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>返回`false`，则调用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>引发异常。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> to the first item of the collection again, you can call <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> followed by <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>到再次，集合的第一项可以调用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>后, 跟<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。

trans-unit.source: If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying or deleting items, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果更改到集合，如添加、 修改或删除项，则枚举数将失效且不可恢复，并且下次调用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>或<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>引发<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException></xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A></xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>到

trans-unit.source: If the collection is modified between <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> and <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>, <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> will return the item that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated.
trans-unit.target: 如果之间修改集合<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>和<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>，<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>将返回到，设置的项，即使枚举数已经无效。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 枚举数没有对集合; 独占访问权因此，枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads could still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改导致的异常。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> that can iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>可以循环访问集合。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrame"></xref> and returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence within the entire collection.
trans-unit.target: 搜索指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrame"></xref>并返回整个集合中的第一个匹配项的从零开始索引。

trans-unit.source: The collection is searched forward starting at the first key frame and ending at the last key frame.
trans-unit.target: 向前从第一个关键帧处开始和在最后一个关键帧结束搜索集合。

trans-unit.source: This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrameCollection.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法执行的线性搜索;因此，平均执行时间正比<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrameCollection.Count%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrameCollection.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: That is, this method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrameCollection.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，此方法为 O (*n*) 操作，其中*n*为<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrameCollection.Count%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrameCollection.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method determines equality by calling <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通过调用<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>确定相等性

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrame"></xref> to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrame"> </xref>要在集合中查找。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of keyFrame within the entire collection, if found; otherwise, `-1`.
trans-unit.target: 第一个匹配项的从零开始索引 keyFrame 在整个集合中，如果找到; 否则为`-1`。

trans-unit.source: Inserts a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrame"></xref> into a specific location within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 将插入<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrame"></xref>集合中的特定位置。

trans-unit.source: The index position at which the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrame"></xref> is inserted.
trans-unit.target: 索引位置<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrame"></xref>插入。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrame"></xref> object to insert in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrame"> </xref>要插入到集合中对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates if the collection size can ever change.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示集合大小是否可以更改。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection is frozen; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果集合被冻结;，否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates if the collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示集合是否为只读的。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果该集合为只读的;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether access to the collection is synchronized (thread-safe).
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否同步对集合的访问 （线程安全）。

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads could still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改导致的异常。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if access to the collection is synchronized (thread-safe); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果对集合的访问同步 （线程安全）;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrame"></xref> at the specified index position.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrame"></xref>位于指定的索引位置。

trans-unit.target: 从零开始的索引<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrame"></xref>要获取或设置。

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.MatrixKeyFrame"> </xref>的指定索引处。

trans-unit.source: The attempt to modify the collection is invalid because the collection is frozen (its <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is **true**).
trans-unit.target: 修改集合的尝试无效，因为集合被冻结 (其<> *1> 属性是* *true**)。

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: index小于零。

trans-unit.target: -index等于或大于。

trans-unit.target: 获取可用于同步对集合的访问的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 一个可用于同步对集合的访问的对象。

trans-unit.target: 元素复制<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>到<xref:System.Array>特定处开始，<xref:System.Array>索引。</xref:System.Array> </xref:System.Array> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array>这是从<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>复制的元素的目标</xref:System.Array>的一维

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array>必须具有从零开始的索引。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `array` at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: 中的从零开始索引`array`复制开始处。
